deans-list-winter-2022.name: Winter 2022 University of Toronto Engineering Dean's Honour List
deans-list-winter-2022.description: This designation is given to students in Faculty of Applied Science and Engineering having a weighted term average of 79.5% or higher in the Winter 2022 semester.

deans-list-fall-2021.name: Fall 2021 University of Toronto Engineering Dean's Honour List
deans-list-fall-2021.description: This desgination is given to students in Faculty of Applied Science and Engineering having a weighted term average of 79.5% or higher in the Fall 2021 semester.

edward-s-rogers-sr-admission-scholarship.name: Edward S Rogers Sr. Admission Scholarship
edward-s-rogers-sr-admission-scholarship.description: Received this scholarship based on my academic achievements and extracurricular activities entering Electrical and Computer Engineering.

euclid-contest.name: School Champion of Euclid Math Contest
euclid-contest.description: The School Champion of 2021 Euclid Math Contest at Holy Trinity Catholic Secondary School.

scholar.name: Ontario Scholar
scholar.description: Ontario Scholars are high school graduates in the Canadian province of Ontario who attain an average of 80% or greater in their six best Grade 12 courses.

awards-of-excellence.name: Award of Excellence in Grade 9, 10, 11, and 12
awards-of-excellence.description: Demonstrated academic excellence by maintain above a 90% average throughout all 4 years of high school

subject-awards.name: Various Subject Awards
subject-awards.description: Received the highest mark in Grade 12 AP Advanced Functions (MHF4UA), AP Calculus and Vectors (MCV4UA), AP Physics (SPH4UA), and U level Computer Science (ICS4U1)

pascal-contest.name: School Champion of Pascal Math Contest
pascal-contest.description: The School Champion of 2018 Pascal Math Contest at Holy Trinity Catholic Secondary School.

cimc-contest.name: School Champion of CIMC Math Contest
cimc-contest.description: The School Champion of 2018 CIMC Math Contest at Holy Trinity Catholic Secondary School.
